	Arcade Hub
</h3>

<p align="center">

</p>

<p align="center">
  Arcade Hub is an open-source site that aims to allows easy access to HTML5, Flash, and unblocked games, along with media and proxies found on the web! Fork and edit our repo and make a pull request to contribute to our growing website and improve it.
</p>
